articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Suphung Power Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Suphung Power Station
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave on-site guidance to the Suphung Power Station.
					Guided by leading officials of the station he went round the monument to the on-site instructions of President Kim Il Sung and the room for education in the revolutionary history.
					
					Noting that the Suphung Power Station developed into a leading power producer under the wise leadership and meticulous care of the President, he stressed that the immortal exploits performed by the President for the development of the Juche-oriented power industry will remain long in the history of the country.
					
					The workers at the station have made great contributions to laying the foundations for the nation's self-supporting economy and improving the standard of people's living while upholding the WPK with production of electricity for over 60 years, he said, highly estimating their proud feats.
					
					Then he made the rounds of different places of the station running at full capacity for increased output of electricity to acquaint himself in detail with the situation of technical improvement and production of electricity.
					
					It is an admirable success that officials, workers and technicians of the station have made radical progress in production of electricity by solving manifold technical problems on their own through brisk drive for modernization and scientification of production processes and active mass technical innovation movement, he said, highly praising their merit.
					
					Very glad to see the spectacular huge-size generators, manufactured by workers in Taean, running in high gear, he said that the national economy is dynamically advancing along the road of victory without vacillation even in any global economic upheavals as it is backed by the powerful Juche-based industry which has been put on the high scientific and technical foundations.
					
					Saying that the position and role of the power station is very important as it holds a big portion in the nation's production of electricity, he indicated important tasks to be fulfilled by it. 
					
					The most important task facing the power station is to improve the management of equipment and technological control to operate it in full capacity, he said, adding that to this end it is necessary for all the operators to take care of equipment and machines like the apple of the eye and, at the same time, fully meet the requirements of technical norms and the standard methods of operation. 
					
					Noting that in order to keep the electricity production going at a high rate at the station it is necessary to wage a ceaseless dynamic drive for modernizing and scientizing its equipment and invent and introduce new technology, he stressed that what is important for this is to strengthen the creative cooperation among scientists, technicians and workers.
					
					 In order to meet the growing demand for electricity it is essential to raise the utility rate of the existing generators and finish the project for installing generators now under way ahead of schedule. 
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the workers of the station would successfully carry out the militant tasks assigned to them by the WPK and thus creditably perform their honorable duties in building a thriving nation. 
					
					He was accompanied by Kim Phyong Hae, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, and Secretary Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek and first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Cambodian Great King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Cambodian Great King
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Norodom Sihanouk, Great King of Cambodia, on his 87th birthday.
					Kim in the message said the Korean people always appreciate very much the feats the great king has performed by devoting his all to the prosperity of Cambodia, the happiness of the Khmer nation and the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and Cambodia.
					
					The message sincerely hoped that Norodom Sihanouk, a close friend of the Korean people, would enjoy good health and make a greater contribution to the country and its people and the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Tunisian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Tunisian President
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Zine el Abidine Ben Ali on his reelection as president of Tunisia.
					 Sincerely wishing the president greater success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country, Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Tunisia would continue to grow stronger in the future, too.

articles.title: Chinese Friendship Visiting Group Here
articles.content:
Chinese Friendship Visiting Group Here
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- A friendship visiting group of China headed by Luo Dihui,  standing vice-secretary of the Party Committee of the National Tourism Administration, arrived here on Friday.

articles.title: UN Day Observed
articles.content:
UN Day Observed
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Torben Due, acting UN resident coordinator in the DPRK, arranged a reception Thursday on the occasion of the UN Day.
					Present there on invitation were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of various countries here.
					
					Representatives of international organizations here were present there.
					
					Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Indonesian Embassies Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Indonesian Embassies Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Daulat Hotma Audison Passaribu, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials did friendship work at the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Yaksu Cooperative Farm in Kangso County, South Phyongan Province on Friday.
					 They helped farmers in thrashing rice.
					
					 During break they enjoyed an art performance, had sports amusement games with farmers and talked with them.
					
					 The guests handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: New Branch of Waterway Goes Operational
articles.content:
New Branch of Waterway Goes Operational
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Jamjin-Taebo branch of waterway was held in Kangso County, South Phyongan Province on Thursday.
					The branch extends tens of kilometers from Mundong-ri, Jungsan County, to Jamjin-ri, Kangso County, and Taebosan-ri, Chollima County.
					
					The completion of the gravity-fed branch of the Kaechon-Lake Thaesong waterway makes it possible to sufficiently water the paddy and non-paddy fields in Kangso, Chollima and Taedong Counties, while cutting down the use of electricity, and adequately supply water to the population in these areas.
					
					Present at the ceremony were Kwak Pom Gi, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Chang Sik, minister of Agriculture, Ri Thae Nam, chief secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, members of the shock brigade, builders and working people involved in the waterway construction.
					
					The thanks extended by General Secretary Kim Jong Il to the members of the shock brigade and working people in Kangso and Chollima Counties for performing labor feats in the waterway construction were conveyed to them.
					
					Speeches were made at the ceremony to be followed by the inauguration of the waterway.

articles.title: Work to Prevent A/H1N1 Flu Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Work to Prevent A/H1N1 Flu Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- A strict anti-epidemic work is now under way in the DPRK where no A/H1N1 flu has yet occurred.
					The relevant institutions have rounded off the quarantine system to prevent the spread of new influenza virus from other countries and made full preparations for prevention and treatment.
					
					The State Emergency Epidemic Prevention Committee has set up a well-regulated information system and the epidemiological information exchange system from the health institutions in the capital city to those in local areas whereby a regular work is conducted to take measures against any slightest symptom reported.
					
					The Central Hygienic and Anti-Epidemic Center of the Ministry of Public Health and other anti-epidemic units at all levels have organized workshops on several occasions to help health workers improve their professional qualifications and raise their roles. In the meantime, a preventive network has been expanded nationwide as evidenced by the increase in the number of the offices for watching new influenza and the supply of necessary medicines and equipment.
					
					Medical examination and hygienic information service for inhabitants have become brisk and those suspected of being new influenza cases are sent to health institutions to undergo tests. Scientific researches into the prevention and treatment of new influenza have been intensified.
					
					A more strict quarantine inspection is now conducted at the airport, trade ports and border posts to cope with the situation where the number of new influenza cases is on the steady increase in the countries and region geographically close to the DPRK.
					
					Veterinary and anti-epizootic organs are also taking measures to ensure that the regulations for epizootic prevention are strictly observed in breeding animals including swine.

articles.title: Ancient Wooden-box Tomb Unearthed
articles.content:
Ancient Wooden-box Tomb Unearthed
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Researchers of the Institute of Archaeology under the Academy of Social Sciences have recently unearthed a wooden-box tomb dating back to Ancient Korea in Husan-ri, Ryonggang County of South Phyongan Province.
					The tomb was found under the ground 1.5 meter deep. It has a hollow of certain size in which there is the wooden box with the coffin enshrined in it.
					
					Most of inner fixtures in the tomb fretted away with passage of centuries, but found there were scores of relics of more than 20 kinds that show the then social class relationship and standard of development of productive force.
					
					Among the relics are weaponry including narrow brass dagger, iron dagger, iron spear and iron axe, means of labor, receptacles, things attached to cart and trinkets, etc.
					
					Through survey into the tomb scale and relics, the researchers ascertained that the tomb dates back to the last period of Ancient Korea.
					
					The relics go to prove that the technique of smelting bronze and casting iron and processing them at that time was of fair level.

articles.title: Football Tournament Goes on
articles.content:
Football Tournament Goes on
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The football tournament of the DPRK Championships has been held in the DPRK since it opened on October 8.
					Participating in the tournament are 16 men's teams and 16 women's teams selected in the regional preliminaries.
					
					The quarterfinals (eight teams) of the male and female football teams which had placed first and second in the group league matches and the semi-finals (top four teams) were held in Kim Il Sung Stadium and Yanggakdo Football Stadium some days ago on the knockout basis.
					
					The male footballers of the Amnokgang Sports Team and female footballers of the April 25 Sports Team drew particular interests of the sports experts and fans in the quarter-finals.
					
					These teams are expected to win the current championships as they had taken the top places in the football tournaments of the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest and the DPRK Championships.
					
					The men's football team of the Amnokgang Sports Team and the women's football team of the April 25 Sports Team advanced into the finals after defeating respectively the men's teams of the Sobaeksu Sports Team and the Kigwancha Sports Team and  the women's teams of the Wolmido Sports Team and the Amnokgang Sports Team in quarter-finals and the semi-finals.
					
					These teams will compete with the men's eleven of the Sports Team of the Ministry of Light Industry and the women's eleven of the Sobaeksu Sports Team which had proved successful in the previous matches. The finals are expected to be hot.
					
					The finals are due to be held on November 2.

articles.title: Three Tombs of Kangso
articles.content:
Three Tombs of Kangso
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The three tombs of Kangso show an aspect of the fine architecture of the Koguryo people out of many heritages created by the Korean nation.
					The tombs are in Sammyo-ri, Kangso County, South Phyongan Province. They are called the three tombs of Kangso as they form a tomb group of big, middle and small tombs of trapezoid shape in a place.
					
					The big one is 50m long and 8.7m high, the middle one 45m long and 7.8m high and the small one about 40m long and 6.75m high.
					
					Each wall of the body chamber of the big tomb was made by piling two to three long and plain rocks, on which parallel and triangular stones were put to form the ceiling. The stones were dovetailed water-tightly.
					
					The tomb showcases the Koguryo people's minute design based on an accurate scientific and technical calculation, skilful construction and delicate stone processing technique.
					
					The murals in the big and middle tombs are excellent out of the remaining tomb murals of Koguryo.
					
					The four guardian deities are the main theme of the murals which are painted on the wall and ceiling stones.
					
					Especially, the blue dragon and the black tortoise-serpent of the big tomb and the white tiger and red phoenix of the middle tomb constitute the acme of Koguryo's pictorial art.
					
					The murals of the Kangso three tombs are appreciated as a masterpiece representing the pictures of the four guardian deities of the Orient in the medieval fine arts circle of the world.

articles.title: Implementation of Five-Point Policy of National Unity Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Five-Point Policy of National Unity Called for
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The five-point policy of the great national unity clarified by General Secretary Kim Jong Il serves as the most just and correct and great programme for national reconciliation and unity as it reflects the reality of the June 15 era of reunification and the aspiration and wishes of all Koreans, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a signed article.
					The policy clearly indicates the fundamental principle and ways for the Koreans to achieve concord and unity, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					The policy calls on the Koreans to unite and improve the inter-Korean relations under the banner of patriotism on the principle of national independence, struggle against the anti-reunification forces inside and outside Korea and strengthen the solidarity and alliance among compatriots from all walks of life. It has displayed great vitality by promoting the unity of the Korean nation and the reunification movement.
					
					The idea of "By our nation itself" has served as the idea of the era of independent reunification and an unprecedentedly hot wind of reconciliation and unity has swept the country, bringing about a stirring reality in which the reunification movement has grown to be a nation-wide movement.
					
					This goes to clearly prove that it is possible to achieve national reconciliation and unity and accomplish the cause of national reunification only when the Koreans advance under the banner of the five-point policy of great national unity.
					
					Only when they go ahead in hearty response to the five-point policy of great national unity can they unite close as one irrespective of differing ideology, political view and ism, improve the deteriorated inter-Korean relations and vigorously promote the cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Commemorated
articles.content:
Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Commemorated
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Turkish and Japanese preparatory committees were inaugurated on Oct. 19 and 24 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					Esin Ozbey, chairperson of the Turkey-Korea Friendship Association, and Sumiko Shimizu, representative of the Japanese Women's Society for Solidarity with the Korean Women, were elected chairpersons of the preparatory committees.
					
					The Turkish committee decided to widely introduce the greatness of Kim Il Sung and hold colorful events conducive to developing the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					The Japanese committee decided to widely organize colorful political and cultural events in high praise of the President's immortal exploits for the human cause of independence and edit and release the records of impressions of those who had some connection with him until April 2012.

articles.title: Torben Due ofrece banquete por "Dia de la ONU"
articles.content:
Torben Due ofrece banquete por "Dia de la ONU"
 Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del "Dia de la ONU", Torben Due, coordinador permanente interino de esta organizacion internacional acreditado en Corea, ofrecio el dia 29 un banquete.
					 A la recepcion fueron invitados el vicecanciller Pak Kil Yon y otros funcionarios coreanos, asi como los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises acreditados en Corea.
					
					 Estuvieron presentes tambien los representantes de las organizaciones internacionales en Corea.
					
					 En la ocasion hubo discursos.

articles.title: Inaugurado canal Jamjin-Taebo
articles.content:
Inaugurado canal Jamjin-Taebo
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 en el distrito de Kangso de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur el acto de inauguracion del canal Jamjin-Taebo, que se extiende a lo largo de decenas de kilometros desde la comuna de Mundong del distrito de Jungsan hasta la comuna de Jamjin del distrito de Kangso y la comuna de Taebosan del distrito de Chollima. 
					Este canal de fluencia natural es afluente del canal Kaechon-Lago Thaesong.
					
					La construccion del nuevo canal posibilita proveer de suficientes aguas para la irrigacion y el consumo a los habitantes de los distritos de Kangso, de Chollima y de Taedong ahorrando mucha electricidad.
					
					 En la ceremonia inaugural estuvieron presentes el viceprimer ministro Kwak Pom Gi, el ministro de Agricultura Kim Chang Sik, el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, Ri Thae Nam, y otros funcionarios, los miembros de brigada de trabajo, constructores y trabajadores movilizados en la obra. 
					
					Fue transmitido el agradecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il enviado a los brigadistas y los trabajadores de los distritos de Kangso y de Chollima, quienes realizaron meritos laborales en la obra.
					
					 Despues de las intervenciones, fue inaugurado el canal dejando pasar por el las aguas.

articles.title: Se activa en Corea labor para prevenir la gripe A (H1A1)
articles.content:
Se activa en Corea labor para prevenir la gripe A (H1A1)
 Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ATCC) -- En Corea se organiza bien la labor para prevenir la epidemia aun en la condicion en que no ocurrio la nueva gripe.
					 Los organos correspondientes establecen el sistema de inspeccion medica para prevenir la afeccion de los virus de la gripe A (H1A1) y disponen de los preparativos necesarios a la prevencion y tratamiento de esta gripe.
					
					 El Comite Estatal de Prevencion Emergente establecio desde el centro hasta las localidades el ordenado sistema de informacion y el otro de intercambio de informacion y realiza normalmente la labor para tomar las medidas sin despreciar aun minimo sintoma informado.  
					
					 En todas las unidades de profilaxis a todo nivel incluido el Centro Nacional de Higiene y Profilaxis del Ministro de Salud Publica organizaron en varias ocasiones el curso de tecnica para elevar la capacitacion practica y el papel de los funcionarios, aumentaron los lugares de vigilancia de la epidemia y prepararon las medicinas y equipos necesarios ampliando las redes de profilaxis en escala nacional.
					
					 Se libran activamente la labor de examen medico sobre la salud de los habitantes y la propaganda higienica y se profundiza la labor de investigacion cientifica para prevencion y tratamiento de esta gripe incluyendo el examen experimental sobre los enfermos sospechosos.
					
					 Ademas, se fortalece mas la inspeccion medica en los aeropuertos, puertos comerciales y los puestos de frontera frente a la situacion en que crece continuamente el numero de los infectados en los paises y regiones geograficamente cercanos con Corea. 
					
					  Los organos de prevencion veterinaria toman las medidas para respetar los reglamentos de higiene y prevencion en la cria y cuidado sobre los animales domesticos como puerco.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun ratifica vigencia de programa de gran unidad nacional
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun ratifica vigencia de programa de gran unidad nacional
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ATCC) -- Las 5 orientaciones para la gran unidad nacional dilucidadas por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il devienen el gran programa mas justo y correcto para la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales que conviene a la realidad de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio y refleja la aspiracion y demanda de todos los coreanos.
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 30 y continua: 
					
					En esas orientaciones estan aclarados los principios fundamentales y los remedios que debe mantener la nacion coreana para lograr la armonia y la unidad de si misma.
					
					Ellas demandan a los coreanos unirse bajo la bandera patriotica y en el principio de independencia nacional, mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur, luchar contra las fuerzas anti-reunificacion internas y externas y fortalecer la solidaridad y la alianza entre los compatriotas de distintos sectores.
					
					Por tales consignas, ellas vinieron dando pruebas de su enorme vitalidad estimulando la unidad y el movimiento por la reunificacion de la nacion coreana.
					
					 En efecto, "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" se hizo el ideal de la epoca de reunificacion independiente y recorre el calido viento de reconciliacion y unidad sin precedente en la historia, de manera que el movimiento por la reunificacion adquiere la dimension pannacional.
					
					 Esta realidad emocionante hace constar a la nacion coreana que la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y el triunfo de la causa de reunificacion de la patria estan en marchar siguiendo las 5 orientaciones.
					
					Cuando ella avance ateniendose a tales orientaciones, podra unirse en un solo bloque por encima de las diferencias de ideologias, ideales, criterios y doctrinas politicos, mejorar las empeoradas relaciones Norte-Sur e impulsar energicamente la causa de reunificacion de la patria.
